Load the position group
```{r}
rbs <- read_csv("./Training_Data/position_groups/rbs.csv")
str(rbs, give.attr=F)
```
```{r}
player_search <- function(name){
  rbs_player <- rbs %>% 
    filter(player == name) %>% 
    filter(week == 16) %>% 
    group_by(year) %>% 
    summarise(
      team = team_name,
      run_plays = run_plays,
      grades_offense = grades_offense, 
      grades_run = grades_run, 
      grades_pass_route = grades_pass_route,
      
      attempts = attempts,
      gap_attempts = gap_attempts, 
      zone_attempts = zone_attempts, 
      yards = yards,
      elusive_rating = elusive_rating, 
      ypa = ypa, 
      yco_attempt = yco_attempt, 
      
      routes = routes, 
      receptions = receptions,
      yprr = yprr, 
      targets_per_game = round(targets / player_game_count, digits = 1), 
      
      total_touches_per_game = round(total_touches / player_game_count, digits = 1), 
      touchdowns = touchdowns, 
      fumbles = fumbles) %>% 
    arrange(-year)
  
  gt <- gt(rbs_player) %>% 
    tab_header(paste(name, "Summary")) %>% 
    tab_spanner(
      label = "Grades", 
      columns = c(run_plays,grades_offense, grades_run, grades_pass_route)
    ) %>% 
    tab_spanner(
      label = "Rushing", 
      columns = c(attempts, gap_attempts, zone_attempts, yards, elusive_rating, ypa, yco_attempt)
    ) %>% 
    tab_spanner(
      label = "Passing", 
      columns = c(routes, receptions, yprr, targets_per_game)
    ) %>% 
    tab_spanner(
      label = "Production", 
      columns = c(total_touches_per_game, touchdowns,fumbles)
    ) %>% 
    data_color(
      columns = grades_offense, 
      colors = scales::col_numeric(
      palette = paletteer::paletteer_d(
        palette = "ggsci::red_material"
      ) %>%
        as.character(),
      domain = NULL
      ))
  
  gtsave(gt, filename = paste("./Outputs/",name, "summary.html"))
  
  gt(rbs_player) %>% 
    tab_header(paste(name, "Summary"))
}

player_search("Derrick Henry")
```
